= Command

[source,bash]
----
pnpx shadcn-vue@latest add command
----

[source,vue,title="src/components/MyComponent.vue"]
----

        </CommandItem>

        </CommandItem>

          Billing
        </CommandItem>
        <CommandItem value="settings">
          Settings
        </CommandItem>
